◆ AFE_PlausibilityCheckVoltageMeasurementRange()

STD_RETURN_TYPE_e AFE_PlausibilityCheckVoltageMeasurementRange ( const int16_t  cellVoltage_mV,
const AFE_PLAUSIBILITY_VALUES_s  plausibleValues 
)

Cell voltage measurement range plausibility check.

Parameters
cellVoltage_mVcell voltage that is checked in mV
plausibleValuesstruct of type AFE_PLAUSIBILITY_VALUES_s with the plausible limits of cell voltages
Returns
STD_OK if no plausibility issue detected, otherwise STD_NOT_OK
